verses.text: \w Wine|strong="H3196"\w* \add is\add* a \w mocker|strong="H3887"\w*, strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w* \add is\add* \w raging|strong="H1993"\w*: and whosoever is \w deceived|strong="H7686"\w* thereby is not \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H0367"\w* of a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add is\add* as the \w roaring|strong="H5099"\w* of a \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*: \add whoso\add* provoketh him to \w anger|strong="H5674"\w* \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* \add against\add* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\add It is\add* an \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* for a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7674"\w* from \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*: but every \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* will be \w meddling|strong="H1566"\w*.

The \w sluggard|strong="H6102"\w* will not \w plow|strong="H2790"\w* by reason of the \w cold|strong="H2779"\w*; \add therefore\add* shall he \w beg|strong="H7592"\w* in \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, and \add have\add* nothing.\f + \fr 20.4 \ft cold: or, winter\f*

\w Counsel|strong="H6098"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is like\add* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; but a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* will draw it \w out|strong="H1802"\w*.

\w Most|strong="H7230"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* will \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his own \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*: but a \w faithful|strong="H0529"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* who can \w find|strong="H4672"\w*?\f + \fr 20.6 \ft goodness: or, bounty\f*

The \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w*: his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add are\add* \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.

A \w king|strong="H4428"\w* that sitteth \w in|strong="H3427"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w* scattereth \w away|strong="H2219"\w* all \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* with his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.
Who can \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I have made my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w clean|strong="H2135"\w*, I am \w pure|strong="H2891"\w* from my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*?

Divers \w weights|strong="H0068"\w*, \add and\add* divers \w measures|strong="H0374"\w*, \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them \add are\add* \w alike|strong="H1571"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 20.10 \ft Divers weights: Heb. A stone and a stone\f*\f + \fr 20.10 \ft divers measures: Heb. an ephah and an ephah\f*

Even a \w child|strong="H5288"\w* is \w known|strong="H5234"\w* by his \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, whether his \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \add be\add* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w*, and whether \add it be\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*.

The \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and the \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* even \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them.

\w Love|strong="H0157"\w* not \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, lest thou come to \w poverty|strong="H3423"\w*; \w open|strong="H6491"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \add and\add* thou shalt be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w naught|strong="H7451"\w*, \add it is\add* \w naught|strong="H7451"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w buyer|strong="H7069"\w*: but when he is \w gone|strong="H0235"\w* his way, then he \w boasteth|strong="H1984"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and a \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w rubies|strong="H6443"\w*: but the \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \add are\add* a \w precious|strong="H3366"\w* \w jewel|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* his \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* that is \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* \add for\add* a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*: and take a \w pledge|strong="H2254"\w* of him for a strange \w woman|strong="H5237"\w*.

\w Bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w deceit|strong="H8267"\w* \add is\add* \w sweet|strong="H6156"\w* to a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; but \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w gravel|strong="H2687"\w*.\f + \fr 20.17 \ft deceit: Heb. lying, or, falsehood\f*

\add Every\add* \w purpose|strong="H4284"\w* is \w established|strong="H3559"\w* by \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*: and with good \w advice|strong="H8458"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

He that goeth \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \add as\add* a \w talebearer|strong="H7400"\w* \w revealeth|strong="H1540"\w* \w secrets|strong="H5475"\w*: therefore \w meddle|strong="H6148"\w* not with him that \w flattereth|strong="H6601"\w* with his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 20.19 \ft flattereth: or, enticeth\f*

Whoso \w curseth|strong="H7043"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, his \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* shall be put \w out|strong="H1846"\w* in \w obscure|strong="H0380"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.\f + \fr 20.20 \ft lamp: or, candle\f*

An \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \add may be\add* gotten \w hastily|strong="H0926"\w* at the \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w*; but the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* thereof shall not be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* not thou, I will \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*; \add but\add* wait \w on|strong="H6960"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee.

Divers \w weights|strong="H0068"\w* \add are\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and a \w false|strong="H4820"\w* \w balance|strong="H3976"\w* \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 20.23 \ft a false…: Heb. balance of deceit\f*

\w Man’s|strong="H1397"\w* \w goings|strong="H4703"\w* \add are\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; how can a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* then \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* his own \w way|strong="H1870"\w*?

\add It is\add* a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add who\add* \w devoureth|strong="H3216"\w* \add that which is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* to make \w enquiry|strong="H1239"\w*.
A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w scattereth|strong="H2219"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and \w bringeth|strong="H7725"\w* the \w wheel|strong="H0212"\w* over them.

The \w spirit|strong="H5397"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add is\add* the \w candle|strong="H5216"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w searching|strong="H2664"\w* all the inward \w parts|strong="H2315"\w* of the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*.\f + \fr 20.27 \ft candle: or, lamp\f*

\w Mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: and his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* is \w upholden|strong="H5582"\w* by \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.

The \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* of young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \add is\add* their \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*: and the \w beauty|strong="H1926"\w* of old \w men|strong="H2205"\w* \add is\add* the gray \w head|strong="H7872"\w*.

The \w blueness|strong="H2250"\w* of a \w wound|strong="H6482"\w* \w cleanseth|strong="H8562"\w* away \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: so \add do\add* \w stripes|strong="H4347"\w* the inward \w parts|strong="H2315"\w* of the \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*.\f + \fr 20.30 \ft cleanseth…: Heb. is a purging medicine against\f*
